statements.update: IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM [WebApi].[Role] WHERE Id=#Id#) UPDATE [WebApi].[Role] SET [Name]=#Name#, [Description]=#Description#, [ModifyUserId]=#ModifyUserId#, [ModifyDateTime]=GETDATE() WHERE Id=#Id# ELSE INSERT INTO [WebApi].[Role] ( [Name], [Description], [CreateUserId], [CreateDateTime] ) VALUES ( #Name#, #Description#, #CreateUserId#, GETDATE() )
statements.insert: IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM [WebApi].[UserRole] WHERE RoleId=#RoleId# AND UserId=#UserId#) RAISERROR('该用户已经添加！',16,1) WITH NOWAIT ELSE INSERT INTO [WebApi].[UserRole] ( [UserId] ,[RoleId] ,[CreateUserId] ,[CreateDateTime] ) VALUES ( #UserId#, #RoleId#, #CreateUserId#, GETDATE() )
statements.delete: DELETE FROM [WebApi].[UserRole] WHERE RoleId=#RoleId# AND UserId=#UserId#
statements.select: SELECT TOP 1 [Id] AS Id, [Name] AS Name, [Description] AS Description, [CreateUserId] AS CreateUserId, [CreateDateTime] AS CreateDateTime, [ModifyUserId] AS ModifyUserId, [ModifyDateTime] AS ModifyDateTime FROM [WebApi].[Role] WHERE Id=#value#

WITH CTE AS( SELECT [Id] AS Id, [Name] AS Name, [Description] AS Description, [CreateUserId] AS CreateUserId, [CreateDateTime] AS CreateDateTime, [ModifyUserId] AS ModifyUserId, [ModifyDateTime] AS ModifyDateTime FROM [WebApi].[Role]
), PAGING AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY Id ASC) AS RowIndex, CTE.* FROM CTE ) SELECT * FROM PAGING WHERE RowIndex BETWEEN (#PageIndex#-1)*#PageSize#+1 AND #PageIndex#*#PageSize#

SELECT a.Id, a.Account, a.Password, a.Description, a.Status, a.CreateUserId, a.CreateDateTime, a.ModifyUserId, a.ModifyDateTime FROM WebApi.[User] a INNER JOIN WebApi.UserRole b ON a.Id=b.UserId WHERE b.RoleId=#value#

SELECT a.Id, a.Account, a.Password, a.Description, a.Status, a.CreateUserId, a.CreateDateTime, a.ModifyUserId, a.ModifyDateTime FROM WebApi.[User] a WHERE a.Id NOT IN(SELECT UserId FROM WebApi.UserRole WHERE RoleId=#RoleId#)
